text: The 1988 MLB Japan All-Star Series was the second edition of the championship, a best-of-seven series between the All-Star teams from Major League Baseball (MLB) and Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB), then-called All-Japan. MLB won the series by 3–2–2 and Barry Larkin was named MVP. == Results == Championship {| class="wikitable" |- ! Game !! Winning Team !! Score !! Losing Team !!
